span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n./v.增补，补充： something that serves to complete or make up for a deficiency in something else
【例】 recommends taking a vitamin C supplement to prevent colds 建议补充维生素 C来预防感冒
【近】 addendum, addition, expansion, increment, proliferation, step-up

【记】 supply + complement 补足；complete 完成；
【另】 supply 补给, 供给
